short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert HTML bookmarks to JSON and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert bookmarks exported from Edge or Chrome into a structured JSON format. The converted JSON file includes details such as the name, URL, and path of each bookmark. Perfect for organizing or backing up your bookmarks.
